about_the_game:
PixiEditor is a pixel art editing software. Create beautiful sprites for your games and edit images. All packed in an eye-friendly dark theme.
Have you ever used Photoshop, Gimp or Aseprite? We want users to get familiar with the tool quickly and with ease.

Features

  • Easy to use - PixiEditor layout is similar to other popular editing programs, so you can get familiar with the tool quickly and with ease.
  • Layers - With our layer system, you can easily organize, edit and work with layers. Delete, group, rename, merge and much more!
  • Blend modes and masks - Do you want a little more advanced toolset? We got you covered! Blend layers with different kinds of settings. Mask them and lock transparency, easy yet powerful.
  • Color Palettes - Fully featured palette system integrated with Lospec Palette List
  • Pixel-perfect pen - A special mode for pen tool, that helps with drawing better pixel-art outlines
  • Quick Search - Quickly find actions, commands and shortcuts.
  • Multiple documents editing support - Edit documents side to side, create multiple columns, rows. Float windows and organize tabs.
  • Stylus support - You can draw and erase using your digital pen.

PixiEditor is open source. The software is and will always be open and free, check out the source code on GitHub. We are a group of passionate people, who work constantly on making PixiEditor better every day.
